Name: Card from Dew Gardening
Desc: A small card usually used to write congratulatory messages, appeared with a bouquet of fresh flowers in a record box at the entrance of the video store.
Desc2: It seems to be a greeting card written in the tone of a florist, but the suggestive wording and the encrypted Inter-Knot address on the card prove that it's actually a commission from an intermediary.
